arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund demolish SC Freiburg in 4-0 home victory
arts.sum: This missed chance proved costly as Felix Nmecha doubled Dortmund's lead five minutes before half-time with a sublime strike from distance, wrong-footing Atubolu and sending the Yellow Wall into raptures. Man of the Match Felix Nmecha celebrates his crucial goal that put Dortmund firmly in control of the game - DFL/Getty Images/Alexander Scheuber

arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Dortmund Thump Freiburg 4-0 Dominant Home Performance
arts.sum: The start of the second half was the most impressive phase of this match for that reason, and this is how Dortmund need to prepare against Bayern Munich, perhaps the most daunting of home games this season. It’s true I expected BVB to beat Freiburg today, but I couldn't have imagined such a strong performance, one that gives me some optimism as this squad prepares to host Bayern Munich next week.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund close in on club record
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund maintain their 100 percent record at the Westfalenstadion this season following a comfortable 4-0 win against Freiburg in the Bundesliga Konferenz. Maximilian Beier opened the scoring for Die…

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Dortmund Faultless Against Freiburg
arts.sum: Goals from Maximilian Beier, Felix Nmecha, Julian Brandt and Jamie Gittens gave Dortmund a confident lead against a Freiburg side who would finish the game with only nine men on the field. It was not the flashiest 90 minutes from Gittens, but a goal and an assist is an excellent return from a player who has been struggled to impact the game in the last week matches.

arts.ttl: Schick hat trick helps Leverkusen cover defensive lapses. Dortmund and Stuttgart win in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Patrik Schick scored a hat trick and injury-hit Bayer Leverkusen overcame a scare before beating Heidenheim 5-2 in the Bundesliga on Saturday. Heidenheim then stunned the defending champions when Marvin Pieringer won the ball from Piero Hincapie and set up Niklas Dorsch to open the scoring in the 10th minute.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leverkusen, Hoffenheim, Dortmund, Stuttgart, and Wolfsburg all victorious
arts.sum: There were no draws in the latest set of five Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs. Czech internationals Patrik Schick (Leverkusen) and Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) were instrumental in helping their teams complete comeback victories. Elsewhere, Stuttgart and Dortmund took care of business with clinical home wins. Wolfsburg also secured their first home win of the season. Coverage of all five simultaneous kickoffs can be found below.

arts.ttl: Sunderland boss urges Chris Rigg, Jobe Bellingham to stay amid Man United, Borussia Dortmund interest
arts.sum: Sunderland boss Regis Le Bris urges Chris Rigg and Jobe Bellingham to stay at the club amid significant transfer interest in the pair.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Match Thread: BVB Return from the International Break Against Freiburg
arts.sum: Streaming: ESPN+ (USA) and Sky Go (Germany) Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments.

arts.ttl: Guirassy reportedly a big doubt for Dortmund's clash with Freiburg
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy could miss Borussia Dortmund's clash with Freiburg, according to Ruhr Nachrichten.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Bundesliga predictions including Borussia Dortmund vs. Freiburg
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Borussia Dortmund vs. Freiburg.
